sentences.en: Dena bought rolls of silk that seemed ridiculously cheap.
sentences.cn: 德娜买了几卷看起来非常次的丝绸。

sentences.en: Harry had carefully bought and wrapped presents for Mark to give them.
sentences.cn: 哈里精心购置了礼物又仔细包好，让马克交给他们。

sentences.en: He bought a sports jacket on sale at Gowings Men's Store.
sentences.cn: 他在高英斯男装店买了一件打折的运动上衣。

sentences.en: He bought an investment property for $100,000 and put down $20,000.
sentences.cn: 他以10万美元买下一处投资性地产，并支付了2万美元的定金。

sentences.en: He gestured at the shelves. "I've bought many books from him."
sentences.cn: 他指着书架说，“我已经从他那里买了不少书了”。

sentences.en: I bought the car from the store for cash.
sentences.cn: 我用现金从这家商店买下这辆汽车。

sentences.en: I bought them for a pound apiece, near enough.
sentences.cn: 我几乎是以一英镑一件的价钱买下了它们。

sentences.en: I once bought a thingummy out of one of those catalogues.
sentences.cn: 我曾经买过那些目录里的一样东西。

sentences.en: I went to Brooks Brothers and bought myself a decent shirt.
sentences.cn: 我去布鲁克斯兄弟专卖店给自己买了一件体面的衬衫。

sentences.en: She bought a travel-bag large enough to contain the film canisters.
sentences.cn: 她买了一只能装得下那些胶卷筒的旅行包。

sentences.en: She bought an English dictionary for me.
sentences.cn: 她给我买了一本英语词典。

sentences.en: She tipped the barmen 10 dollars and bought drinks all round.
sentences.cn: 她给了吧台服务员10美元小费，还请在场的所有人喝了酒。

sentences.en: That afternoon she went out and bought a new dress.
sentences.cn: 那天下午她出门买了一件新裙子。

sentences.en: The mattress and base are normally bought as a set.
sentences.cn: 通常床垫和床架是成套购买的。

sentences.en: They bought so much beef that some went bad.
sentences.cn: 他们买了太多牛肉，有些都变质了。

sentences.en: This is fearfully expensive compared with the last one I bought.
sentences.cn: 这和我上次买的相比贵得吓人。

sentences.en: We stood in with him who bought us the meals.
sentences.cn: 他为我们买回了吃的，大家分摊了那笔钱。

sentences.en: When we bought the house, it was structurally sound.
sentences.cn: 我们买下这栋房子的时候，它的结构还非常坚固。

phrases.tran_cn: 产品返销；补偿交易；补进
买下…的全部产权；出钱使…放弃地位
价廉物美的东西；廉价品

trans.tran_cn: 购买，购得( buy的过去式和过去分词 )，做出牺牲以获得，够支付，买通
